summary:
The way Skyrim on PC should have been, WIP.
TruePC v1.4 by Nekroze from EturnilNetwork.com
descriptionHtml:
TruePC by Nekroze from EturnilNetwork.com 
========================================================================================
A set of tweaks and changes, some gathered from around the active Skyrim descussion locations and some from my own testing.

These tweaks culminate in, what I hope, is a better graphics option for PC. Some setting like 
shadows may be questionable on their softness but many of these tweaks come from my disappointment 
in the \"Quality\" of many things like the shadows on PC and my attempt at compensating it until 
someone with real skills can fix it when the CS comes out. Also this includes more PC compatable
changes like removing mouse acceleration and increasing FOV and some other little fixes for PC like ENBseries and 4gb patch!

For those who want to test the latest bleeding edge version of TruePC you can choose either of the
2.0 Pre-Beta options from the installer. Use the second (fix) 2.0 Pre-Beta option only if you the patching process
or INSTALL-TruePC.exe script at the end of the installation fails.

For those who want to give it a try and are not sure about it:
1 - it is SUPER easy to install and remove cleanly.
2 - Pictures just cannot capture almost any of the modifications so you really have to see it in action.
3 - nothing to loose from trying it!

INSTALLATION:
========================================================================================
1 - Download
2 - Run the installer
3 - Select ONE version to install (1.4 is a stable release OR Select 2.0 if you want to try out the pre-beta)
4 - OPTIONAL: Select also ENBseries for added graphical perfomance and fixes
5 - Keep the installer open and DONOT run TruePC at the end of installation yet!
5 - Open Skyrim launcher and set graphics settings to HIGH (only the overall settings button leave everything else default (make sure your resolution is correct))
6 - Now run TruePC from the last installation dialog and accept the patching proccess
7 - TEMPORARY FIX: For now you will need to go to Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim and run INSTALL-TruePC.exe to fix an installer issue
8 - Play Skyrim like its a drug!

UPDATE:
========================================================================================
1 - TEMPORARY FIX: For now you will need to go to Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim and run INSTALL-TruePC.exe to fix an installer issue
2 - Run the uninstaller from your StartMenu->TruePC
3 - Run the Installer for the new version!

UNINSTALL:
========================================================================================
1 - TEMPORARY FIX: For now you will need to go to Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim and run INSTALL-TruePC.exe to fix an installer issue
2 - Run the uninstaller from your StartMenu->TruePC
3 - Continue playing as if you had never experienced TruePC Skyrim

To simplify installation i have included and used SwissFileKnife as found 
here http://stahlworks.com/dev/swiss-file-knife.html and also have included the bsd-license it comes with.
Also TruePC has packaged in a 4gb patcher from http://www.ntcore.com/4gb_patch.php
and the always awesome ENBseries modifications from http://enbdev.com/

ISSUES/TROUBLESHOOTING:
========================================================================================
POST INSTALLATION SCRIPT FAILED!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Try deleting Skyrim.ini and SkyrimPrefs.ini and then going into the launcher and setting your graphics to HIGH, this will
create perfectly clean ini\'s to work with, always worth a try.

If you are still having Issues installing, you can either examine your ini files and the TruePC.ini and change your erronious
values to the expected OR under when installing try use any FIX version of the version of TruePC you are trying to install instead.

STILL WANT MORE SKYRIM GRAPHICS?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
check out http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=21 or http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=31 
for a great and elegant modifications to Skyrim that work perfectly with TruePC! 
NOTE: I am in no way affiliated with the author of the above mods I am just a fan.

For now, if any other issues arise or if you have any feedback/suggestions please leave them in the 
discussion/comment section for this mod and I will get back to you as soon as a human with a fresh copy of skyrim can!

So please enjoy and keep in mind that this is my first public \"mod\" ever!
   Nekroze
   
SPECIAL THANKS:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Big thanks to phantomgamerz for QA testing and general help!
